Message from the Chairperson

Maria Theresa Jesusa Albano

Chairperson, DFAMPC

With great pride and gratitude, I address you as the Chairperson of our esteemed cooperative. Since our humble beginnings in 1991, DFAMPC has grown into a strong community dedicated to serving and uplifting its hardworking members from the DFA and its attached agencies.

Message from the Chairperson

Maria Theresa Jesusa Albano

Chairperson, DFAMPC

It is with great pride and gratitude that I address you all as the Chairperson of our esteemed cooperative. Since our humble beginnings in 1991, DFAMPC has grown into more than just a cooperative; we have become a community dedicated to the service and well-being of our members. This journey of over three decades has been a testament to the shared values and unwavering commitment we hold as a cooperative exclusive to the hardworking members of the DFA and its attached agencies.

As we reflect on our achievements, it is important to recognize that none of this would have been possible without the support and trust of each of you. Together, we have built a foundation of mutual respect, integrity, and a vision of collective success. This cooperative was created not only to serve the immediate needs of our members but also to uplift lives, provide opportunities, and foster a sense of unity that makes us stronger.

Looking ahead, we remain steadfast in our mission to innovate and expand our services to better meet your needs. The world continues to change, and so must we. We are actively exploring new initiatives that will further enhance our financial sustainability, create new opportunities for growth, and ensure the continued prosperity of every member. Your success is our success, and it will always be our goal to ensure that DFAMPC remains a reliable partner in your journey. Let us continue to work together, with optimism and dedication, toward a future filled with hope and success. I am confident that with your continued support, we will achieve even greater milestones, making our cooperative a shining example of what can be accomplished through unity and shared purpose.

Thank you for being part of this remarkable journey. Here's to a future of continued growth, progress, and collective success for all of us.

MABUHAY DFAMPC! MABUHAY TAYONG MGA MYEMBRO

News & Events

1st Year Zumba Class Anniversary

March 20, 2025

Get Ready to move, groove and celebrate! DFA Multipurpose Cooperative (DFAMPC) is pleased to invite the community to the 1st Year Anniversary Celebration of DFA Multipurpose- Cooperative Zumba Class - a fun-filled evening dedicated to camaraderie, dedication, fitness and high-energy dance workout. This milestone marks a year of enthusiasm, dedication, and the DFAMPC's commitment to a healthier and more active lifestyle for its stakeholders.
